## Set up
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
```


## Temperature conventions
```{r}
airtemps <- c(212, 30.3, 78, 32)

celsius1 <- (airtemps[1] - 32) * 5/9
celsius2 <- (airtemps[2] - 32) * 5/9

```


Create functions!

```{r}
convert_f_to_c <- function(fahr) {
  
  celsius <- (fahr - 32) * 5 / 9
  
  return(celsius)
  
}

celsius1a <- convert_f_to_c(airtemps[1])

```
